name: Goat Hell
description:
You are an executioner of hell, forced to fight through hordes of hell goats. Why? Who knows, but all you know is to spill goat blood, and to do it good. 

Using your refined combat skills, fight through 8 different levels of goats, fighting through tiny demon like goats, all the way up to magic casting goats (!?)

But be careful! Your lust for goat blood will take over, making you temporarily stronger, but unable to heal for a duration when you fill up your blood capacity!

Controls:

- Arrow keys (Movement)

- Z (Basic attack up to 3 times)

- Side X (Lunging special attack, costs 25% meter)

- Down X (Heal, 25% meter)

- Neutral X (Smash special attack, costs 25% meter and grants invincibility shortly)
